channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These cheap Nintendo Switch puzzle games will keep you sane if you’re dreading the family get-together this Christmas
item.description: Jupiter’s Picross titles on Switch all have a metric ton of content, with appearances from some of your favorite games and developers.

item.title: Here's where to get Nintendo eShop gift cards for your new Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: Here's where to buy Nintendo eShop gift cards for your new Switch 2.

item.title: Comment installer Nvidia GeForce Now et lancer ses jeux en cloud gaming sur Steam Deck ?
item.description: Il date un peu, mais le Steam Deck s'est offert cette année un sacré coup de jeune avec l'intégration d'une application native Nvidia GeForce Now. Le cloud gaming partout avec soi, en voici une promesse alléchante. Mais d'abord, voici comment installer la plateforme de cloud gaming sur son Steam Deck.

item.title: Intel sells the fastest sub-$200 CPUs that you can buy right now and AMD can barely keep up, even with a Ryzen 9 5900XT — so I have to ask, is Intel the new AMD?
item.description: Intel’s cheapest desktop CPUs are now faster than AMD's, and Team Red is feeling pressure across the sub-$200 market.

item.title: The ‘Star Wars’ Gag in ‘Wake Up Dead Man’ Is Pure Rian Johnson
item.description: We are obsessed with the 'Star Wars' joke in the latest 'Knives Out' film, now on Netflix.

item.title: How a Spanish virus brought Google to Málaga
item.description: Spanish entrepreneur Bernardo Quintero, whose company is at the root of Google's Málaga cybersecurity hub, identified the author of the computer virus that influenced his career.

item.title: Corsair’s new Void v2 MAX Wireless takes one of the best mid-range gaming headsets and makes it even better
item.description: Corsair's new Void v2 MAX Wireless model updates its predecessor with improved connectivity and smarts. With such a small difference in price and features, it’s the natural choice for most gamers, making a great headset even greater.

item.title: Bridgerton Season 4 trailer unveils Benedict’s masquerade mystery
item.description: The Bridgerton season four trailer teases Benedict’s masked romance and a forbidden love that could change everything.
